name: The Antarctic Creature
description:
Hello everyone,

I want to take a moment to thank all of you who have played my game where we have to escape an unknown creature in a scientific military base in Antarctica. The game features low poly graphics and various objectives that players need to complete in order to progress. However, please note that there is no save feature, so make sure to plan accordingly.

I created this game with the intention of providing a challenging and immersive experience, and I hope that you have all enjoyed playing it as much as I enjoyed making it. Your feedback and support mean a lot to me and will help me improve my future projects.

Thank you again for playing and I hope to bring more exciting games to you in the future.

Best regards, Johnny Bresson (Rhinochoc)
